column1: Art Institute of Chicago////One of the world's best art museums
column2: the Art Institute includes the largest collection of Monet outside of Paris. (In the 1880s
column3: famous Chicago millionaires like Bertha Palmer (of the Palmer House Hilton Hotel) really got into Monet and bought a lot of it. The white marble building itself was built for the 1893 World's Fair and then converted to the art museum afterwards.
